oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Development of a Competitive ELISA for Detection of Leptospira borgspeterseni serovar hardjo in Vaccinated Cattle
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Frizzell, C. M.
McCarroll, J.
Mackie, D. P.
Ellis, W. A.
Breadon, E.
Montgomery, J. M.
Kavanagh, O. V.
Logan, E. F.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: ELISAs
leptospiral antibodies
naturally infected
test
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: There are many reports on the use of ELISAs as tests for the detection of leptospiral antibodies, however, no test to date has been developed that has the potential to discriminate between vaccinated and naturally infected animals.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 2003; 187
